text: # title - Yokosuka Jazz Rock Festival (横須賀ジャズロックフェスティバル)  # datetime - Not specified in this source (please check the official festival page).  # place - Verny Park (ヴェルニー公園), Yokosuka, Kanagawa, Japan *(mentioned as a simultaneous event at the same venue)*  # detail - This festival is listed as another event held at Verny Park during the same period as the Yokosuka Winter Illumination. - For schedules, performers, and venue details, refer to the festival website.  # attention - The PDF does not include dates, times, or program details—confirm on the official festival page.  # link - Festival page: https://www.wakuwaku-yokosuka.jp/special.php?ID=183  # tags - music - jazz - rock - festival - Verny Park - Yokosuka - Kanagawa - event

# title - Yokosuka Winter Illumination (横須賀ウィンターイルミネーション)  # datetime - 2025-10-31 (Fri) – 2026-01-04 (Sun) *(planned)* - Lights on: 17:00 - Lights off: 22:00 - Note: Lighting hours may change depending on other events.  # place - Verny Park (ヴェルニー公園) - Address: 1-1 Shioiri-cho, Yokosuka, Kanagawa  # detail - Yokosuka City will light up the night scenery of Verny Park—known for its view toward Yokosuka Honko (the main port) and its orange-toned nightscape—using illumination themed around champagne gold. - Decoration/illumination areas include:   - Planting strip (from the Shioiri side to Oguri Plaza)   - French-style flowerbed & lawn area (around the western-style gazebo and the fountain)   - Western-style gazebo   - Itsumi Hatoba Gate (逸見波止場衛門) - Access:   - About 1 minute on foot from JR “Yokosuka” Station   - About 5 minutes on foot from Keikyu “Shioiri” Station - Contact: Cultural, Sports & Tourism Department, Planning Division (Yokosuka City) - Phone: +81-46-822-8427  # attention - Dates and hours are listed as *planned* and may change. - Lighting time may shift due to other events. - Consider checking the official pages before visiting, especially during holiday periods.  # link - Event page (CocoYoko): https://www.cocoyoko.net/event/winter-illumi.html - Official city announcement: https://www.city.yokosuka.kanagawa.jp/2110/nagekomi/20251029_illumination.html  # tags - illumination - winter - night-view - Verny Park - Yokosuka - Kanagawa - event

# title - Miura Clan Heritage Stamp Rally (Yokosuka City)  # datetime - 2025-11-14 (Fri) to 2026-01-04 (Sun)  # place - Yokosuka City, Kanagawa, Japan (23 Miura Clan–related locations across the city)  # detail - This is a city-wide stamp rally themed around the Miura clan, a warrior family that supported the founding of the Kamakura shogunate. Participants visit designated “stamp spots” and collect digital stamps using their smartphone’s GPS. After collecting stamps, you can apply for a prize drawing (luxury gifts are mentioned). The route is designed to be explored with a convenient digital map, and representative spots include Manshoji Temple, Manganji Temple, Arasaki Coast (Nagai Castle area), and Arai Castle area.  # attention - Participation is free, but you are responsible for smartphone data charges and transportation costs. - Some “castle” spots are medieval sites; there may be no castle buildings or structures to see at those locations. - You will need a smartphone with location services (GPS) enabled to obtain stamps.  # link - Event page: https://www.cocoyoko.net/event/miuraitizoku.html - Official stamp rally info / digital map: https://www.cocoyoko.net/special/miuraichizoku.html  # tags - Yokosuka - Kanagawa - Miura clan - Kamakura period - history - stamp rally - digital map - temples - castle ruins

# title - 2025 Yokosuka Chuo Illumination Photo Contest  # datetime - Photo contest entry period: Dec 1, 2025 (Mon) – Jan 31, 2026 (Sat) - Illumination lighting period: Dec 1, 2025 – Mar 22, 2026 - Lighting hours (illumination): From sunset to 24:00 (midnight)  # place - Along Chuo Odori Avenue, Y Deck, and the plaza under Y Deck (Yokosuka-Chuo area) - Address area: Wakamatsu-cho 2-chome, Yokosuka City, Kanagawa (and surrounding spots)  # detail - Take your best winter illumination photo in the Yokosuka-Chuo area and submit it via Instagram. - How to enter:   1) Follow the official Instagram account: @yokosukaxmaslights   2) Photograph the illuminations in the Yokosuka-Chuo area during the entry period   3) Post your photo on Instagram tagging @yokosukaxmaslights and add the hashtag “#IllumiYokosuka2025” (original Japanese hashtag: #イルミヨコスカ2025) plus one theme hashtag below. - Themes (choose one):   - Nostalgic: #ノスタルジック   - Romantic: #ロマンティック   - Winter Cool: #ウィンタークール - Everyone can join as long as you agree to the entry rules.  # attention - Winners will be contacted by Instagram Direct Message during February 2026, so make sure your account can receive DMs. - Prizes (approx.):   - Grand Prize: Selectable Domestic Wagyu (catalog gift, about ¥30,000) – 1 winner   - Special Prize: 47CLUB catalog gift (about ¥10,000) – 1 winner per theme   - Honorable Mention: Prizes worth about ¥5,000 – 2 winners per theme - Please read the contest rules before posting. - Access: Keikyu “Yokosuka-Chuo” Station (East Exit), about 0–5 minutes on foot.  # link - Event page: https://www.cocoyoko.net/event/photocon-illumi.html - Official Instagram: https://instagram.com/yokosukaxmaslights  # tags - Yokosuka - Yokosuka-Chuo - Winter illumination - Photo contest - Instagram - Night view - Kanagawa
